snippet.title: Free Update | Toca Blocks | Gameplay Trailer | @TocaBoca
snippet.description:
Never miss a new trailer ★ SUBSCRIBE ★ http://bit.ly/Subscribe_Now_TocaBoca
◉ AVAILABLE ON GOOGLE PLAY & THE APP STORE ON THURSDAY, JUNE 30! ◉

Toca Blocks is a unique world-building app that lets you create worlds, play in them and share them with friends. Where will your imagination take you?


WHAT'S NEW IN THIS UPDATE?
● Snap photos of your work and share their unique Blocks Codes so friends can import your world. Or import their worlds and explore them!

● All characters can now climb ladders, beanstalks and tree trunks. They can swim even better than before.

● Check out the new objects: a balloon you can pop and inflate, shrubbery, a rainbow, a sign post to show you the way, a bouncy tree branch, fireworks, heart fruit, a ladder and a moving platform. We’ll unveil even more new objects on Instagram and YouTube!

● Find exclusive content on the new in-app Club Blocks channel.

----------------------------------------------------------------------
✭WATCH MORE TRAILERS✭
----------------------------------------------------------------------

App Store Trailers ►► https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLzUouPjxVATnYpcLOYvLp08Dcw2sLi_xI

Google Play Trailers ►► https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLzUouPjxVATmmDvZk1Gwhnypk6VHrm9Md

Gameplay Videos  ►► https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLzUouPjxVATlrYPZa-rqMhg9XWyBvwR4L

----------------------------------------------------------------------
Never miss another video — subscribe to our channel! http://bit.ly/Subscribe_Now_TocaBoca
----------------------------------------------------------------------

KEEP UP WITH TOCA BOCA
Instagram:  http://instagram.com/tocaboca
Facebook:  http://facebook.com/tocaboca
Twitter:  http://twitter.com/tocaboca
Pinterest:  http://pinterest.com/tocaboca

ABOUT TOCA BOCA
We think playing and having fun is the best way to learn about the world. Therefore, we make apps that are simply fun and creative, without in-app purchases or third party ads! Yep, that’s us.
